descriptions.Oscillator: These shapes return to their initial state after a finite number of generations.
descriptions.Spaceship: These are shapes that translates themselves across the grid.
descriptions.Methuselahs: These are shapes which evolve for long periods before stabilizing.
descriptions.Brick Layer: These are shapes which have been proven to grow indefinitely.
